data.text: Each level has 2-3 puzzles, first a very easy one, then more difficult. If you fail the more difficult puzzle, you start the level over from the beginning, meaning you have to replay the easy one before it will even let you retry the hard one. Replaying the same puzzles over and over is very annoying and boring. There's also a time limit on each level, but they don't give you enough time. You can watch an ad for more time, but the game already too many ads. More ads than game time.

Too many ads. Fun little time waster ruined by yet another developer that thinks "how many ads per minute" rather than "how many ads per player". Step 1, make the game fun, step 2 monitize without completely ruining step 1. The extra bolt, daily bonuses, undo button, ect should be a great source without the player feeling like its forced. 2 stars instead of 1 because forced ads are the short type.

The game is fun, but i have two issues. One the number of ads is obnoxious. Especially the ones that are a 30 second video, than a mandatory interactive screen, then another static streen after. Two, the difficulty of the levels is usually well calibrated, but I took issue with hidden screw holes since you can't plan for them on the first try. The level feels too very difficult until you randomly come across a screw hole that was hidden by a board that you wouldnt have thought to move.

It would be good if it didn't have two separate levels in one, putting the easy first and hard last. I just play this game for the hard puzzles, and it's very annoying having to completely reset right after almost finishing the puzzle onto something I have finished 50 times. It makes the game feel very repetitive and gets worse after getting hit with something like, "Spend a ticket or watch an ad to undo one move," as I just want to play the game to have fun, not spend time watching ads for it.

Game is super fun. Ads are absolutely ridiculous. They are 45-60 seconds long (or more) and required constantly, so many it actually inhibits gameplay. If the ads were shorter, it wouldn't be bad, but they are 35 seconds, then 15 seconds, then 5 seconds, then 5 more seconds, then 3 seconds....EACH AD. I get it, the devs want us to pay for ad free. There's a line that keeps free players playing AND ad revenue flowing, but they've crossed it.

This would be a great game however, the ads are freaking ridiculous!! Every single selection requires watching an ad that is at least a minute long!! Yes, there is an option to stop the ads for an hour for $5 BUT it never lasts an hour and uses your silver and gold dollars and as soon as those run out your back to watching ads, just not as many!!
data.replyText:
Hi. Thanks for your feedback. Please describe your issue in more detail on our fanpage and we'll look into it for you
https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: No way of achieving any bonus within a reasonable time. The tickets take several days before receiving just one. Then ads...the ads on this are ridiculous. There's so many and they're usually 45-60 seconds long. 95% of the time you're watching at least 1 ad for each of the harder levels. There's 2 puzzles per one level. It's dumb.

The concept is nice, and I enjoyed the first few levels. The difficulty progression, however, is crazy. Level 4 took at least 6 tries to get past the 2nd part (ran out of time a couple times). Level 5 was easy. Level 6 was almost a repeat of Level 4 in terms of difficulty and running out of time. I rather have multiple levels of equal difficulty in a row, then having levels with 1 "easy" puzzle and 1 "hard" level.

The game itself is fun. But there's too many ads and the ads are too long. Plus, I didn't think the levels were timed because the ad didn't show that part. I don't like timed games. Also, some are too hard to solve due to not enough holes and needing to watch ads to unlock more holes. So I'll probably be uninstalling this game. I don't have time for the long ads.

I spent the 4.99 to remove the "forced" ads, but you are still forced to watch ads before every days daily puzzle. For every "extra" space(it's not extra it's 100% required to solve the puzzle). Need to try again or replay? Another ad. The extra minute, sure that one is legit but the others are ridiculous and I'm upset I let them con me out of my money while still forcing me to watch more ads to be able to play the game. The game is atleast 50% ads, after I paid for the "forced" ad removal.

I love the mechanics of this game and not much else. Either you pay a lot to TEMPORARILY pause ads or you watch a ton of them every time you play. And the ads have a tendency to freeze the game so you end up watching the ad for the "reward" of force quitting and starting again from scratch. Too bad, because it's fun otherwise, but I'm uninstalling before it freezes on me for the 10th time today. UPDATE: Found a much better version of this game from a different developer.
data.replyText:
Hi.

We understand your concerns about some levels requiring ads.

We strive to ensure every level is solvable without boosters. We're appreciate your input.

If you encounter a specific level causing difficulty, feel free to share it with us through our Facebook page for getting Hint

https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: There is a "race other players" mode to finish 5 levels first. What they don’t tell you is that it's just the standard levels. So there's ads in between each level, plus if you get stuck and watch an ad voluntarily to try to keep momentum, that counts against your time. Plus, there isn’t a guarantee you'll get past the level after burning every power up anyway. Waste of time.

If they can just fix the restart to just one section instead of starting from the beginning, then I'd have no problem. The difficulty spike levels do require trial and error, but just feels exhausting when you have to start over from the previous level. Still pretty fun and does its job of killing time. Better than what you see on those bait and hook ads you'd see on tiktok or Facebook.

Too many glitches, too many LONG ads. Watch a minute long ad to get an extra hole and the game freezes, reboots, and you watched that ad for nothing. Then you have to watch another ad. Spend 10 seconds on a mini puzzle watch another ad. Get to regular puzzle watch an ad to get a hole. More time spent on ads than playing. Also the physics are not correct so the pieces do not fall where they should and then it blocks all the holes. Expect to watch at least 3 if not 8 ads per level

I like playing this game but it freezes a lot. The levels aren't so difficult that they are impossible to pass, but when you need to watch an ad to get a boost it has a tendency to either not let you push the button to watch the ad, or, you watch the 45-60 second ad and the game freezes so you have to force close and restart anyways.

I really enjoy the puzzles, but will stop playing today because of the excessive length of ads. Over a minute for 1 ad is ridiculous! if you can't get me interested in 15 seconds, a longer ad will just make me angry. The Luckyland Slots ads are more than 1 minute long, appear too often, and really interrupt gameplay. Their app is also misleading, in that it is ONLY available thru their ad - not available thru any app store.

I really liked this app when I started playing it. But then suddenly, once you hit level 45-50, you get hit with time limits. For the easy puzzles, that's not a problem. But for the difficult ones, it doesn't give you enough time to finish them unless you want to spend actual money, which I refuse to do. I've played this one level 6 times. I know how to beat it. But every time, I'm always about 45-60 seconds short.

Ads Ads Ads!!! Come on now with the ads. The amount of time spent watching ads is longer than the game play. Every 2 levels an ads comes, you have to watch an ad to do anything in the games now. I have deleted all games on my phones because of this reason, and this one has been un-installed for the same reason. STOP WITH THE ADS. It gets old and boring, and the game isn't enjoyable anymore.

The puzzles are alright, but one of the empty holes has to be unlocked by watching an ad, and there's no way to permanent unlock it on all puzzles, even by paying. Speaking of ads, there are a TON! SO MANY ADS. Also, all puzzles start with one mini puzzle then have a second real puzzle, so if you retry the second puzzle, you have to watch an ad and then resolve the first mini puzzle before actually getting the chance to retry the puzzle you were on. It's a lot of wasted time.
data.replyText:
Hi.

We're appreciate your input.

We strive to ensure every level is solvable without boosters.

If you encounter a specific level causing difficulty, feel free to share it with us through our Facebook page for getting solution without booster for that level

https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: Addictive but if you can't pass a level (even using boosters like undo, unscrew, add a hole), you're SOL. Period. The only option left is to delete the app because you can't move on. The hint option was great for these situations, but you took that away. Maybe I'm not intelligent enough? 😔 That's the message you are portraying, "If you're too stupid to solve a level, we can't help you anymore." Frustrating and discouraging. Please bring back the numerical steps ON THE SCREWS, not on the boards.

Your ads stink. I watch probably a couple dozen ads on other apps daily, so I have no trouble with ads. Yours get stuck or they get to the point where they should end and be exitable, but they won't let you exit. For a game that has ads and needs them to play some parts of the game, yours would be easier to navigate. Not happy with the game I thought I would enjoy.

I like the idea of this game but the implementation sucks. Each puzzle has a ludicrously easy first part and then a harder part where one mistake means restarting. I have ads blocked, so that's not an issue, but I'm frustrated even without them. Also there is one song on a 5 second loop and it's terrible.

The puzzles are cool and challenging. That's the good. The bad? One false move and you can't undo(unless you watch an ad) want to start the hard level over? Ad. This is with the "ad free" version. Each level is a easier puzzle to solve then the harder one. When you fail you have to do the easier again...this is to make you dread exiting so you can use "boosters" to skip this needless part. It's cheap and frustrating. There are better versions of this game out there. I would recommend them.

It would be an awesome game if only two things were different: 1) a small number of Undo functions automatically available on each level, maybe three? And 2) drastically fewer ads. A 60+ second ad for every booster is excessive when a single mistake stops the level completely, PLUS another 60sec ad any time you try to restart a level. Awful.

The game itself is fun and challenging, but I paid for the ad free version AND STILL GET ADS!!! And they are LONG. And to top it off, the app glitched after I won a particularly difficult puzzle and the timer kept going and said I lost! I want my money back. This is not a way to relax, this is the most frustrating waste of a game I've ever had the misfortune of playing. If I could give a NEGATIVE rating, I would.
data.replyText:
Hi there!

The ""NO FORCED ADS"" package only removes ads that automatically appear after a certain amount of gameplay. You may still see ""OPTIONAL ADS"" which you can choose to watch for in-game rewards.

For any questions or concerns, please contact us: https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: This is great for the first several levels, but glaring issues start to appear. This game isn't a logic puzzle as it is trial and error as the expected physics don't work and the blocks don't really do what they should. Also having to repeat a very easy puzzle just to get back to the hard one each time is a waste. Ads for a free retry or undo don't load more than half the time in an effort to get you to make in game purchases.

The amount of ads is DISGUSTING!! Before, during, after a level, and that's not even mentioning in order to use booster or continue play after messing up. There are ads that are insanely long and you CANT skip them. 60 seconds on top of a 15 second next section and THEN another 5-10 second section making a minute and a half ad. Others are a minute and a half on top of the added 20-30 seconds. Some lock your game and you have to start over. If it weren't for ads it'd be great but it's not

WARNING THEY WILL SCAM YOU!!!! They have a VIP package that removes all forced ads and gives you some other bonuses for $4.99 They have another option that just says "Remove ads" and it is also $4.99 Leads me to believe the second one removes ALL ads not just forced ones since it does not specify. I have been asking for a refund every day for a week and they continue to open my messages(on FB) and ignore me. I even showed them my receipt proving that it did not state that it was only forced ads.

The game itself is fine. Not real challenging but enough so it's not boring. It's the constant ads that are the problem. Ads between levels is fine. I get the need for that. But to have to watch an ad for every thing you do??! A 3 minute level can take 5 minutes just because of being forced to watch ads. THEN, an ad between levels to boot! It's just to much! More ads than game play!👎

Unbearable. First, the chance of actually loading the home screen is 1/10. Once it does load and you get into the game, it makes you watch an ad for every mistake, and the ads are minutes long. Want to undo a move? Ad. Want to reset the board? Ad. Out of time? Ad. Yeah, why is it timed? Who is going to complete a puzzle in 3 minutes? Quickest app delete I've ever done.

Fun and challenging. Too many ads. You can buy VIP, but it's expensive and you cannot pay to get rid of ads forever. Also, you can't watch ads to get helpful items in advance, so gameplay is interrupted constantly and, therefore, not fun. I've also seen bars move upwards to block holes a few times. It's not that often, I'm up on level 167, but it's super annoying. At this point, the game is more stressful than relaxing, so I'm uninstalling it.
data.replyText: Hi friend! We're glad you enjoy our game. REMOVE ADS package might be a better fit for you than the VIP package, right? https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: Like the idea of the puzzles, HATE that they are timed. And if you fail a "hard" level, you have to complete the previous level again before re-attempting the "hard" level. I really wish I could just play each puzzle at my leisure with no timer. Also the forced ads are long and often install new games automatically which is SO annoying. Glitchy as well, the steps you want to take sometimes hesitate or stutter. What a shame, because this seemed like a cool game. UNINSTALLED. Clearly a 5 star lie.

Honestly, I really like the game. The puzzle/logic aspect is very enjoyable. The ads however are not merely inconvenient, they are oppressive. You can quite literally end up spending more time watching ad than playing the game. Ads to start, ads when you complete a level , ads to activate what should be basic game function. It pretty much makes the game unplayable.

I am uninstalling just as fast as installed. I enjoy all kinds of puzzles. This is not one of them. The ads that felt so long, didn't even bother me as much as the timer, and the difficulty right from the beginning. Timer runs out, BOOM, you have to repeat the other levels from the beginning. Just my opinion, but it wasn't fun for me. More frustration than excitement. And you don't even get a few free hints or "undos" from the beginning like most games. Either watch a LENGTHY ad or pay $. No TY

When you first play the game, they give you a very easy level before they hit you with the hard level. However, they do not give you enough holes to place the screws without watching an ad. If you mess up, then you can't reset. You have to leave the game, go back to home, and play both levels all over again. Also, you will spend most of the game play watching 30+ sec long ads. (2 in total each game play if you get lucky). I love the puzzles and love the game but I will be uninstalling for this.
data.replyText: Hi friend! Thanks for sharing your feedback. The game edition with bug fixes and improvements is now available.In HINT, you can always find solutions without watching ads or using boosters. We invite you to play and experience the game, and let us know what you think. WoodNuts&BoltsPuzzleABITeam

data.text: Edit: 50 seconds ads!! I gave it another try and the ads are 50 seconds long and can't be skipped! The game is fun but the ads are horrible. Most are 45 seconds long and you get them all the time. Beat the level; ad. Restart; ad. Fail, ad. Need an extra hole (which is almost everyone of the hards); ad. You can't actually play the game because the ads are so bad. For every minute of time on this app, expect 45 seconds to be on ads and and 15 seconds for actually playing.

I enjoyed the"sample" played in ads. Actual game play is not good. You have to watch multiple ads to be able to complete a hard level game. I think I played to level 4 and had to watch probably 8 ads. Level 4 is labeled "extremely hard." I'm on my 3rd attempt, and every time, you have to watch two ads just to be able to get enough open spaces to move the screws to. I don't mind most game ads, I will click them sometimes and add things like this game! Very disappointed. Deleting.
data.replyText:
Hi friend. In Level 4, horizontal wooden bar can be adjusted for faster movement. To do this, loosen the five bolts holding it in place, except for the one at the end. Then, remove the two bottom bolts on the other end. This will allow the bar to slide more easily
https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: The puzzles are great!!! I love how challenging they are. However you CANNOT do anything without an ad. Want to undo a move, ad. Want to replay a level, ad. Need more time, ad. Want a hint, ad. Timer runs out a second time, you cannot get more time. You can only choose to pay for more time or choose to re-challenge, which requires another ad. This is an Awesome game, but the level of greed required to force SO MANY UNNECESSARY ADS into this game is TOTAL INSANITY. Uninstalling. HUGE time waster!

Everyone is talking about ads.. but my gripe is the time limit on top of incredibly slow moving blocks once you unlock them. One or the other. Don't ad a time limit if every single block is going to be super slow to clear the board if you don't do it in a certain way. I was super close to finishing a level, but the 10 seconds for one block to move out of the way caused me to lose.

Puzzles are definitely challenging. I paid for "no intrusive ads," which was $5, and still ended up needing to watch multiple ads for each level. Need a hint? Ad. Made a mistake and want to undo it? Ad (but these are also limited unless you want to purchase in-game currency using actual money). I would not recommend this game, and I definitely would not recommend giving any money to it.

The graphics are good, game play is mainly smooth, although the physics are not very credible at times, (on purpose) making it harder to guess the right move and forcing multiple tries. If the ads were shorter and could be skipped at ~10 seconds instead of watching the whole ~minute (like with other games) I'd have no problem with them. Now I rather reboot the whole game to replay a level or move to the next, instead of waiting for the ad to finish. This also crashes a lot at least on my phone.

Ads, Ads, and more Ads! The puzzles are fun but basic. I enjoyed them. The more difficult ones you need to watch an add for an extra space or watch an ad to get a booster. Everything you click on gives you an ad. Sometimes two. Another level? Ad. Restarting? Ad. And you can pay to stop the FORCED ads. Not all ads. Those you can pay to stop for 1 hour. Only 1 hour. Again, the game is fun. But the ads ruined it for me.

This game is infuriating. There's no satisfaction to solving a puzzle. I am driven bonkers over and over again if I so much as misclick once. It wouldn't be an issue, except everytime I failed a puzzle, not only do I have to restart it, but I have to restart the previous easy puzzle after watching an ad. I dread opening this app now because I know I'm gonna accidentally screw it up and be met with the same fate. I loved the playable ad, but this app aint it. The Home music is annoying, too.

Nice game and challenging. I enjoy it but I hate the intrusive ads! Stop that! The ads pop up at many times. You can skip some but you still have to wait at least 10 seconds. There are ways to use ads more effectively and give players the choice to play ads to get boosters or other perks. So, if you hate forced ads... Don't bother unless the creators change that.

This is a realIy fun game. Visually stimulating and challenging. I would love to give it 5 stars but as others point out, the ads are frequent and intrusive at times. My biggest gripe is the timer. I get that it makes it challenging but some of us like to chill at times. I'd also be good with buying it but I don't know what they mean by stopping "forced ads." If it's the ads after each set, I'd buy in a second. But I think it's the banner ads. If devs could weigh in, it would great.

I am convinced this game is made by sadists. If the evil god of physics doesn't get ya, the timer sure will. I haven't found too many ads, they've all been optional. But they sure don't feel like it! Most of anything that could help you is locked behind an ad. Most ads I've gotten have been a minute or longer, and it can really kill any momentum you had with your thought process. Would be more chill if the time wasn't so constrained.

Good gameplay but there an obscene amount of ads. I don't mind ads but this game takes it too far. It is impossible to solve after a certain point without going through at least 1 or 2 powerups which are all ad blocked. The ability to even restart the level and try again is also ad blocked. Played a max of maybe 20 minutes of actual solving time in total, and the rest was filled with 20 ads, between levels, for powerups, for restarting the puzzle, ect. You can't enjoy this game at all.

I absolutely love the puzzles and could spend all day playing. What I DO NOT love, it right out the gate, everything you want to do? Ad. Next level? Ad. Not enough time to complete puzzle? Ad. Retry, ad, rechallenge (?), ad. So on and so forth. I even went to look at how much it would be to remove the ads, but it looks like it might be for only 7 days....? Also, it would be nice to have an option to be able to do puzzles without the added stress of a timer.

You have an ad that comes up from the bottom and covers More than half of the screen if you push the little arrow to put it down, it opens that website and all the while your timer is decreasing. It happens every time I move anything that pops up takes I bet to get it down, back to the game the timer's up. Otherwise I really like the game but I'm installing it I can't deal with the aggravation of that blasted advertisement at the bottom of the page

How is this game rated so well? It is extremely fun with very interesting puzzles... that is obliterated by ads, a puzzle time limit, and zero room for mistakes. The aggressiveness of the ads and how their store popping up with their currency is egregious. I had to watch an ad to return to the home screen from the middle of the game. I would pay a few bucks, one time for the app. Nope, they have a 30 day subscription instead, and even then, what you're paying for is pathetic. Total garbage.
data.replyText: Hi friend! Thanks for sharing your feedback. The game edition with bug fixes and improvements will be available at weekend. Please press PAUSE then RESET to restart at the same level without ads https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: It's a money grab don't bother. The time needed to complete the hard puzzle is only enough if you quickly complete the correct series of moves in order. You will have to redo levels over and over again until you get it right and watch ads in-between every try. One ad I encountered was 60 seconds long!. or you can spend your actual money to extend the time to actual compl3te the level.

I usually ignore complaints about ads, but this one is way over the top. There is no way to accumulate boosters - just watch the ad. The timing is always insufficient - more time with an ad. The number of open spaces is often not enough, but you can open that bonus spot - with an ad. Here's the worst part. The ads are 40 seconds of ad, 12 seconds of convincing you to interact with the ad, and a few more for you to just wait for the button to get rid of the ad. None of them are skippable. Bye!

I actually quite like this game. The levels are challenging and fun. But after about 2 weeks I'm already at level 338 so maybe not THAT challenging. I absolutely agree with the other complaints about the ad-hungriness of it all. I do use the blue magic tickets as needed and appreciate that they are awarded fairly easily. However... WHAT IS THE POINT of the silver tickets???? There is NOTHING in the game that gives a clue as to what to use them for. Stupidity.
data.replyText:
Hi friend! We're glad you enjoy our game. Silver tickets unlock REPLAY and UNDO Boosters. Conquer the challenges and let us know what you think!
https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: WAY TOO MANY ADS!!! I actually like the game. However, the amount and length of the ads is unbearable. I will be uninstalling this app right after the review. The other reviewers ARE NOT LYING about how aggressive and jntrusive these ads are. It's unbearable and ridiculous. Then on top of that the hard levels are timed but the timing is not according to how hard the level is. Yea I can't with this particular app.

I get that each level is a trivial puzzle and a harder one. I don't need a warning every single time. The puzzles themselves are genuinely interesting, but pretty much everything else detracts from them, half of which are obviously to encourage ad viewing or microtransactions, ok. Devs gotta eat. But much of the rest is, I assue, mean to be fun, and is mostly just annoying distraction. YMMV. This one is not for me, but could be with changes it's probably not in their interests to make.

To put it shortly, this is almost literally unplayable. Not only is it easy to mess up on puzzles, instead of being able to undo mistakes on a whim, someone quite literally has to pay money to do so. Not to mention the physics are actively working against the user, making puzzles basically unsolvable within the allotted time limit for each level.

The game is relies too heavily on pay to win functions, and if you mess up on a level you can't simply reset the level you got stuck on without watching at least one ad, plus there's a time limit on finishing a level, and if you don't finish the level within the time limit it makes you watch an ad to retry the level, then it takes you back at least one puzzle you previously completed, overall I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone looking for brainteasers

Super fun but.....ADS,ADS,ADS I completely understand the point of ads, that's how a lot of games make their money and they are able to make these games but the amount of ads to play the game is absolutely ridiculous. Most games you get an ad at the beginning, maybe at the end, maybe watch an ad to here and there to get an upgrade. But this game to complete the level, you pretty much have to watch multiple ads just to complete the level. Even the payment option for no ads is not truly no ads!

The pushiness to watch ads or buy things is unmatched by any other game I've played. If you think I'm going to spend money to get pictures of pieces of wood to drop, you can't be serious. Watching the ads is okay a few times to get the extra hole, but then the timer comes in, even though it is not displayed, and time is up and you have to buy things or start over. Again, you can't be serious. Game uninstalled.

The game itself is fun and would be very enjoyable. However, even if you purchase the ad free option, you have to choose to watch ads to complete puzzles. The ads are way too long and too repetitive. I'm uninstalling and looking for something else. Disappointed 😞
data.replyText:
Hi. There are 2 kind of Ads: FORCED ADS and OPTIONAL ADS. Incase you buy NO FORCED ADS package, it only removes ads that automatically appear after a certain amount of gameplay. You may still see OPTIONAL ADS which you can choose to watch for in-game rewards.
For any questions or concerns, please contact us: https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: This game is top tier predatory. The levels are rigged so you have to pay real money or watch the same ads over and over to win. Even if you are solving the puzzles perfectly, the physics on the wood will cause them to fall super slow, blocking the holes you need to complete the stage. Each stage is timed, so once the timer runs out you have to pay to for more time, or watch an ad. You also have to pay to redo the level....yeah a hard uninstall for me. Great concept, very greedy developers.

The puzzles are challenging enough, the only part I don't like is having to replay the super easy level first before getting to the harder level. I don't think there should be 2 puzzles in each level. Remove the easy puzzle or make it it's own level. Fix this and I'd give it 5 stars.

I see that every one like the game but they uninstall it due to too much ads. And I am one of them. Even if you want to restart a level they still show u ad. If I want to watch ad why I not get extra time I'm game after watch the ad. Really tooooo much ads. Sorry to uninstall I like this game and fully install again in future if you remove or less the ads or allow payers to play it without internet. 👍

This game is frustrating. They have some puzzles where the only way to finish it is to watch an ad for an extra screw hole. If you make a mistake there is no undo and you can't just restart the level, you have to redo 2 levels. All puzzles have ridiculously little time so there's no time to think. Extremely fun concept, extremely greedy execution

This game could be very enjoyable. However, the developers have designed it so that you MUST watch ads, usually more than once, in order to solve the more difficult puzzles. I understand that they have to make it ad-supported in order for it to be free for users, but I've spent more time watching ads than actually solving the puzzles.

Love the playable ad, having the demo send me to the store gave me the authentic experience of having the gameplay interupted. Surprisingly there is a game between these ads, but it's lack luster. By the by, I beat level 2 of the demo by using the back button after every tap, but lazy devs don't account for that sort of thing, right?

It's a shame, this could've been a fun game but too many ads to complete every single board. There's literally ads for EVERYTHING unless you're willing to keep going in your wallet. Also, some of the boards are unpassable. And forget the hint button..ads for the hints and the hints are vague. They put the order numbers in between 4 screws so it could be any of them. Waste of time...uninstalling- sad because the game could be fun without all the aggravation.

Edited: They made a small update, now U CAN restart the lvl once U hit the dead end. So I gave it an extra star. I really liked this game. I even paid to remove ads, but this game still sucks.1st, Why do I have to pass an annoyingly simple level that takes you 8 seconds to solve before U can actually get to the main,difficult level every time i restart? Why?? 2nd, they intentionally give you not enough free holes, so U are forced to watch ads to get an extra hole. But the levels R interesting!
data.replyText: Hi friend! We are happy to provide you with the better gaming experience. In the Update, you can always find solutions without watching ads or using boosters in HINT. We value your feedback and suggestions for improving our game. WoodNuts&BoltsPuzzleABITeam

data.text: this is literally the most ad hungry game I've ever seen and it's honestly disgusting. this game not only throws an ad in your face just as often as any other game, but it also practically mandates full length ads to make any sort of progress in the game, as well as to perform the most basic of actions such as replaying a level. what's even more vile is that the option to pay to remove the ads in the game ($4.99 btw) only removes the ones that are forced, not the ones you "choose" to watch.

I hope the Play Store sees this and block this app. this morning, I noticed that two apps (dave and Misty play) from ads this game shows during game play were now installed on my phone. I found it very weird as I am very particular about the apps I download. I instantly removed them, but remember, while playing this game, it was hard to get out of the ad loops. I am also deleting this game, though I enjoyed playing, I can't support an app I can't trust. Becareful everyone.

The game itself is fun and addictingly challenging. My only problem is that the game developers have not screened the legitimacy of the ads that they run during the game. About once every few levels an ad will run that opens up a virus warning web browser tab. This is a common ad scam tactic but the existence of these scam ads on this game are a serious security threat. I would love to keep playing this game but I don't want to risk getting a virus on my mobile phone.

I enjoy the simple then hard level, but hate the ads for everything. Unscrew=ad, Unlock a hole-ad, Redo-ad. It is insane how many ads they want you to watch. Sure they have tickets that you can buy or get 1 daily, not enough. I wasn't planning on saying anything until this morning, when I learned there's a limit to how many ads you can view before they cut you off and either you buy tickets or share. I'm sorry, as much as I enjoy this game it terrible. I was in the lead for a race too.

Game is fun, but the ads are unbearable. I paid the $4.99 to remove ads only to find it removes ads for one hour instead of permanently, and after buying this, the game wouldn't let me unlock the extra holes that usually cost an ad. I can't use any boosters, and most of these hard levels are impossible to beat without these ad-locked extras. Ultimately, I'm livid that the money I dropped on this game ended up making it even more unplayable.

Actually really challenging (if you don't watch reward ads every level for the extra stuff). I could definitely see someone disliking just how reliant on watching video ads, but if you just keep trying, you find yourself slowly improving at a pretty satisfying physics and logic based puzzle. I'm not very good, I'm currently only at level three after a whole night at it, but I'm looking forward to slowly unwinding the next puzzle. The timer ticking down to two ads in a row wasn't cool though.
data.replyText: Hello, friend! We're glad you enjoy our game and appreciate your feedback. We hope you continue to have fun and challenge yourself with our puzzles. Happy gaming! WoodNuts&BoltsPuzzleABITeam

data.text: Physics? We don't know her.... If you expect things to fall in a logical fashion, you'll be waiting forever. The pieces defy gravity at every turn and you'll be lucky if you're only just frustrated with the way this game responds. If it even remotely followed the laws of physics, this game could be a relaxing little gem.... but it doesn't and it isn't, do not recommend.

I am so sad at the way ads are structured into this game. I really liked the puzzles, they were challenging. But even after paying for no "forced ads" they still block off key features to that are required for you to pass a level. Its like they don't actually want people to play their game. They just want downloads, and then players realize everything is blocked by ads. Not worth it and such a waste of a good game.

This game randomly came up in an ad I was playing for another game. It looked challenging & I ❤️ complicated puzzles,so I thought why not give it a try. EVERYONE is correct about the ad's HOWEVER,I honestly don't mind the ad's . What upsets me is that when I'm playing a challenging puzzle & the game is timed, & I need 2 watch an ad cuz I don't have a blue ticket, we get 3min & I feel the 3min. should start AFTER the ad(it's only fair cuz the ad is super long & takes time off solving the puzzle!)

Fun but too many ads and every level is doubled. I get needing to make money but geez let folks play some. Each help you use you have to watch an ad, after every level and sometimes between part 1 and 2 of a level there is an ad, as soon as you open the app there is an ad. Just ridiculous. And one each puzzle a hole is covered you have to use and guess what you have to do to use it, watch an ad. Yall must be banking big off those ad monies!

not super happy with this game. level 4 is really challenging and I'm struggling to get past it. having to watch lengthy ads just to get past it with no boosters offered isn't making me want to play the game, as it seems there's no benefit to passing the first 3 levels. timer runs out too fast as well. probably will delete since it's really not worth the time.
data.replyText:
Hi friend. In Level 4, horizontal wooden bar can be adjusted for faster movement. To do this, loosen the five bolts holding it in place, except for the one at the end. Then, remove the two bottom bolts on the other end. This will allow the bar to slide more easily
https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: If you love watching long ads, this is the game for you. WAY too many ads and most are 30 plus seconds long. While the game itself is fun, i don't enjoy having to replay a level more than 2 dozen times to beat it. And it is way too difficult to get any kind of power up. That isn't fun and it doesn't mean the game is "challenging." It means you are greedy, wanting people to spend money to buy stuff or it means you think people enjoy having to pay a level over and over again.

Screw this game 😠, I try to unlock a booster, an ad or two comes on, both ads play all tje way through, and the game never have me the booster, and I still being brung back to level 4 over and over again. This game is a waist of time and I'm uninstalling it. I'm done with this game. I like the screw puzzle better even though it got me stuck by a glitch at level 48.

Puzzles are very challenging. Unfortunately, the developer made it so you can't complete puzzles without watching ads. I watched 15 ads just to get through one of the first 10 levels. Ridiculous. The ads are now averaging 45. Seconds to a minute each. Find a different game. This one isn't worth your time.

I want a refund! Which is frustrating because the puzzles are fun but You can't finish one without being dealing with several thirty second ads through each puzzle. It's unavoidable and very annoying. I paid real money for the no ads feature but it didn't work and the only thing the company gave me was a "sorry for the inconvenience." I want my money back.

I just started playing and had to stop. You can't do anything without watching an add. Can't undo a move, can't restart the game and can't use all the holes. It really kills the experience of what could be a really fun game. They have an add bar across the bottom, I don't think we need to watch adds for everything we do in the game. If they fix that, I'd give it 5 stars, but it really kills the game play.

level 4 is hard to win. i have played level 4 over 6 times. even with all the "upgrades" or "boosters", you run out of time. i am not bad at puzzles like this, the game is poorly made. in level 4, part 2, the squares ALMOST fell out because all the screws were removed in multiple games. in two games, they CHANGED DIRECTION (from falling left to falling right) and got stuck. i would need 2 time boost extensions - maximum one available by watching an ad. NOT WORTH UNLESS IT IS FIXED.
data.replyText:
Hi friend. In Level 4, horizontal wooden bar can be adjusted for faster movement. To do this, loosen the five bolts holding it in place, except for the one at the end. Then, remove the two bottom bolts on the other end. This will allow the bar to slide more easily
https://www.facebook.com/woodnutpuzzle

data.text: Way too many ads. Even glitches offline because ads try to play and there's no connection to play them. This game is fun but it seems to rely solely on ads for EVERYTHING. Every minute is like 15 seconds of game play then the rest of the 45 is ads. It's not as enjoyable as it could be if the ads were at least cut in half. Annoying people with ads for other games will basically make them hate the game because of the ad. Uninstalling until they hopefully fix it.

Game itself deserves more than 1 star but the ads and the time limit on the "hard" levels. Should be impossible levels when they give you no time for such a slow moving game. I get ads pay for the game but i just had to watch a 119 second ad for an extra hole that was needed to complete the puzzle. I'm uninstalling as fast as I installed!

Garbage game. The thought behind it is ok but they make every other puzzle improve to beat without watching a 30-40 second add or 3. Then once you do finally beat it your forced to watch another add. Then when you click the X to leave the add when it's done the first is usually a trick X forcing you to go to the adds play store site anyways. Makes the whole game not fun

Two stars because I like the game on a fundamental level; nicely challenging in levels rather quickly BUT. The ads keep crashing the game. You have to watch ads after EVERY board, and many of them are inappropriate for a game rated E. Not enough non-advert opportunities to earn the tickets that allow you to use the assist functions on a board, so you have to watch an ad.....which half the time crashes the app. Or, the advert shows but you STILL don't get the thing you were watching it for.

Would be enjoyable if you didn't have to start over with both puzzles, and the time limit had an ad so you could actually finish the puzzle without spending real money. I could never get into the game because I couldn't enjoy working out a puzzle without the stress of never finishing bc Im not spending money for every puzzle I was to finish.

I enjoyed playing this game, this morning I went to play and it kept freezing so I checked for an update. Tried to update it wouldn't so I uninstalled and reinstalled and now I'm back at level 1, when I was over 80, 1 :-/ and no way to get my progress back. No way to contact support. And wth are the coins for? I had 7300 and no idea what to do with them. Guess I'm done with this game which sucks because I enjoyed it more then other puzzle games.

Fun concept, but at this stage it's just an advertisement watcher (ie you spend more time watching ads than playing). Something else I noticed was that many of those ads were for games that magically ended up on my phone without me wanting them. So yeah, I'm uninstalling this game while keeping my eye out for something as challenging as this game, but without the weaselly-ness.

I love the little screw mini game on the calendar. I absolutely hate the adds and having to watch adds to get help. I spent so much time on this game. I haven't been able to play it the last couple of days and then I updated, still no use. Ive made it so far and I was number 1 for so long. The disappointment is mailable. Such a shame.

This game is just a cash grab and obviously paid for their reviews. There is no way a reasonable person rated this 5 stars after watching a 30 or 60 second ad between each level. I played 4 levels and watched 3 30 second ads. Moving into the 6th level started a 60 second ad and I uninstalled immediately. Considering the puzzles take less than 30 seconds I was watching ads more than half the time and this is unacceptable.

The game is interesting but lots literally a money grab. They don't give you enough holes to free the screws. There's no reset button. You have to watch an ad to try the level again. After I paid $10+ to be as free, I'm somehow stuff on a level that doesn't even show the puzzle. Literally can't complete puzzle 97. Try a different game
data.replyText: Hi friend! Thanks for sharing your feedback. The game edition with bug fixes and improvements is now available. Please press PAUSE then RESET to restart at the same level. If you need immediate support, please reach out to us via feedback@abigames.com.vn. We're always here to support you. WoodNuts&BoltsPuzzleABITeam

data.text: It's a fun concept, I wanted to like the game. However when you are in a tricky level and have to watch 3 ads just to give it one more try it gets old fast. Especially if you're on the last one and it freezes so you have to watch all 3 again. Do yourself a favor and play a different game, this one is just irritating.

Ads make it completely unplayable. I understand apps like this need to make money, but the ads to get boosters that are almost entirely necessary like the extra hole or removing one screw are more than enough. Hands between each and every level and if you need to retry a level are way too excessive. Paying to remove ads vastly improves the game, but if for $5 only buys you two days...not worth it.

This is a great concept. I enjoyed the challenge. I'm uninstalling it because for every 30 seconds of play, you have to watch 2 minutes of ads. There are no help options. The introduction of hard levels are introduced too soon, before a player understands the game. There are many other games out there, don't waste your time

This is an atrocious game, there are tons of ads and you have to watch an ad just to reset, there is also a time limit on each level, and you go from a annoying easy to a insanely hard level (mainly because of the time limit) overall this is a horrible game I do not recommend.

There are way too many ads! 3 min timer for easy and hard levels. Eliminate the timer. You have to watch an ad for added time, restart, get a hint(worthless when you are stuck) or to remove a bolt all together. You have to watch an ad to advance to the next puzzle as well. Shorten the ads to 15 seconds and more people would keep playing. The game started glitching recently and you weren't able to do anything. Going to take a break from playing before uninstalling.
